text: End of (the) night may refer to: * Dawn, the beginning of morning twilight ==Arts and media== ===Films=== * Nishant (film) (English: Night's End), a 1975 Hindi film directed by Shyam Benegal * The End of the Night, a 1989 Italian film directed by Davide Ferrario * At the End of the Night, a 2003 Italian film directed by Salvatore Piscicelli ===Literature=== * The End of Night (book), 2013 book by Paul Bogard ===Songs=== * "End of the Night", a 1967 song by The Doors * "End of Night" (song), a 2013 song by Dido ===Television=== * "End of Nights", an episode of the television series Sanctuary ==Other uses== * Nishant (name), a common Indian male given name, literally meaning "end of night" ==See also== * Journey to the End of the Night (disambiguation)
title: End of Night
